Reviews.Title: Misleading Pic and Description
Reviews.Author: Dre
Reviews.Content: When I was contemplating purchasing some additional security cameras, I wanted to add 4 cameras to my existing security system. when I saw the picture here for this item i decided to go with this purchase because the description had 4 dome camera and also the pic for this item showed 4 separate cameras. I just received the package and was pissed when I opened it. It was only one camera in the box. Wish I can call this company and speak to them about this because I only intended to spend around $40 on a camera and not $129 for a single camera. As for the functionality I haven't tested it as yet. When I do I would probably repost

ProductInfo.Features:
600TV lines of resolution provides excellent picture quality
Night Vision up to 50ft away in total darkness
Automatic Infrared Filter ensures true color in all lighting conditions
Outdoor weatherproof and tamper proof housing rated at IP 66
high resolution, built-in 3.6mm wide angle view lens
Built-in Infrared lights for night vision
Weatherproof aluminum housing for indoor and outdoor application
Auto Gain Control; Electronic Shutter Adjustment; Great for indoor security
60ft cable and power adapter included
Color CMOS image sensor
ProductInfo.Name: iSmart C4010DP6 CMOS 4 Pack IR Dome Security Outdoor Weatherproof 600TVL CCTV Surveillance Camera 60 ft cables & power adapter
